snippet: Four games into his professional career, quarterback Robert Griffin III has given Redskins fans hope and become a transcendent figure around Washington.
abstract: Washington Redskins rookie quarterback Robert Griffin III has given Redskins fans hope and become a transcendent figure around Washington.
lead_paragraph: Four games into his professional career, quarterback Robert Griffin III has given Redskins fans hope and become a transcendent figure around Washington.

headline.seo: Robert Griffin III Excels for the Redskins
headline.main: Griffin Beats Pressure, of Defenses or Fans
headline.print_headline: Griffin Beats Pressure, of Defenses and of Fans
